item.title: Excel Tools
item.description: Dasboards Automation Core Features Next Steps Excel is a popular, easy-to-use, and powerful tool. Most importantly, most people already have Excel, so the cost of an Excel tool is extremely low! If you are a small business or have limited resources to commit to a data solution, an Excel based tool is a great option to consider. As one of my professors in grad school used to say: â€œwe went to the moon using a slide rule, so Excel can solve most problems that exist on earth!
